author: binh
title: An asset token platform on Cardano
description: Illiquid assets (inventories, real estates, others) have been lacking of liquidity. Tokenization of such assets creates liquidity for them.
solution: Building an asset token platform on Cardano, mixing with a barter exchange, brings a good solution for illiquidity issue of real assets.
experience: Mr. Nguyen Thanh Binh (team leader): Ph.D degree in Economics (Virginia Tech, VA, USA), 22 years working experience in banking & finance.
